name: planarally
description: PlanarAlly is a self-hosted virtual tabletop for role-playing games (RPGs). It supports maps, fog of war, user roles, and real-time collaboration through a web interface.
features: Virtual tabletop: Host online RPG sessions with interactive maps and token management.
Fog of war: Reveal map areas dynamically as players explore to maintain suspense and discovery.
Token management: Place and move character tokens with drag-and-drop controls and initiative tracking.
Map layers: Organize map elements on separate layers for terrain, objects, and lighting effects.
Real-time collaboration: Multiple players connect simultaneously with instant updates for all participants.
Drawing tools: Sketch on maps with freehand drawing, shapes, and measurement tools for tactical planning.
Asset library: Upload and organize custom maps, tokens, and assets for reuse across campaigns.
Vision and lighting: Configure token vision ranges and light sources for realistic dungeon exploration.
User roles: Assign game master and player roles with appropriate permissions and visibility controls.
Grid support: Overlay square or hex grids on maps for accurate movement and distance measurement.
Notes and markers: Add text notes and markers to maps for location descriptions and reminders.
Session persistence: Save game state automatically so sessions can be resumed at any time.
